entity.name: In Chicago, Trump calls the city an embarrassment to the US
entity.description: Donald Trump has opened his first visit to Chicago as president by disparaging the city as "embarrassing to us as a nation"

text: @realDonaldTrump Mr President, please keep an eye on what’s going on in Illinois regarding the Coronavirus response. This state is being run into the ground by Chicago Democrats, without regards to the good people downstate, where most counties supported you in 2016.
